The image in question was published in a: 2019 Facebook post claiming to show India PM Modi touching Sonia Gandhi's feet.
The misleading post: s Hindi-language caption referred to Rahul Gandhi's promises of 72,000 INR ($1,000 USD) to the 50 million poorest Indian families and filling 2.2 million vacant government posts.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: showing Modi touching the feet of L K Advani.
The image of Sonia Gandhi used in the mi: which can be found on AFP's Image Forum website.
